name: DSE Contributor Badge v1
description: Non-financial credential issued by ValorYield Engine for contributions to the Department of Sovereign Evolution (Strategickhaos Sovereign Compute Authority). This NFT is a badge only. It does not represent equity, profit share, or an expectation of financial return.
contribution_summary: Ran enterprise benchmarks and documented results
legal_disclaimer: This NFT is a non-financial credential. It is not an investment contract, not a security, and not a promise of dividends or profits. It serves solely as a record of contribution and recognition within the Strategickhaos ecosystem.
